Name: Ninja Hanrei
About the game: Ninja Hanrei is a 2D run and gun Platformer game inspired on Ancient Japan but with Super Powers. Explore 2 Worlds with 14 extensive Levels each. Kill all the enemies you find. Successfully Jump all Platforms. Collect as much coins as possible. Destroy the two bosses in the Game and survive. Obtain your highest score on the Endless Mode Unlock 6 different types of Powers. Use and buy skins The game has Pixel Art Platforms and Background Painted Digitally. The Music has been made with traditional and modern oriental instruments. The Game Will be Updated, with more skins, Levels and Worlds.
